name: Potato Science
description:
CONTROLS

Controller (strongly recommended):

Claw Operation - D Pad Left and Right to move claw,  D Pad Down to drop claw.

Potato Controls - L2/R2 to rotate.

Attachment Controls

Wheels - Left Analog to drive.

Pogo Stick - Hold A and release to bounce.

Potato Gun - Press X to fire.

Grappling Hook - Tap Y to fire or retrieve the hook. Hold Y to reel the potato in.

Keyboard:

Claw Operation - Left and Right arrow keys to move claw,  Down to drop claw.

Potato Controls - A/D to rotate. Hold shift to spin faster.

Attachment Controls

Wheels - Left and Right arrow keys to drive.

Pogo Stick - Hold Down arrow key and release to bounce.

Potato Gun - Press Space to fire.

Grappling Hook - Tap Up arrow key to fire or retrieve the hook. Hold Up to reel the potato in.

Hit enemies at speed (or with attachments) to damage them. Retrieve their attachments by rolling over them.

Browser not as smooth as Windows version, but still works.
